From: King, Darrin <dking@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 1:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] How? Where?


> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *My smith is a Dark Elf, and I was wondering about smithing as
> *a Dark Elf.
>
>
> I know that ore is sold in Neriak. Go downstairs in the Blind Fish
tavern;
> the two dart players sell ore and I think molds, not sure.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Always wanted to set up a book club, but can't find the time?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Create an online book club through ONElist.

Hey my name's Darren too... spelled differently but King Darrin awesome hah

yah the armor molds are sold in the second level of the toadstool building.
It's called the Toadstool I think it's a bar/inn or something.
